dimension: 5 3/8 x 30 1/2 x 3 in. (13.65 x 77.47 x 7.62 cm) (length includes fringe)
title: Head Wrap
description: lined head band; geometric embroidery cross stitched in reds, greens, black and white; applied red fringe tape to bottom edge; 2 different thick tassels
creditline: The Ruth Ann Dayton Chinese Room Endowment Fund, The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art, and The Helen Jones Fund for Asian Art
